Version Labels Tab

The Version Labels tab identifies the version label(s) assigned to each revision number. The Version Labels tab contains the following fields:

This field... Identifies the...
Version Label Name of the version label.
Revision Revision that the version label is assigned to. Floating version labels move with the latest revision of the selected versioned file. They display by substituting an asterisk after the decimal of the revision number (for example 1.*).

Working in the Revision Pane Working in the Versioned File Pane
